modName: Dragon Wall - Skyrim Main Menu Replacer
summary: Dragon Wall - Yet Another Wallpaper (Replacer) for the Skyrim Main Menu
descriptionHtml:
\"Dragon Wall\" by Kamafi

* Another Skyrim Main Menu picture.
* Best for 16:10, but good with other screen resolutions too.
* Falling snow looks OK with this wallpaper.

Files:
(A) With dragon symbol
(B) Just text - no dragon symbol
Choose the one that you prefer.


= IMPORTANT =

1. It\'s intended to use with
No Bethesda Logo In Menu - Mod by IceKK
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8023]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8023[/url]

2. Recommended to use with
Skyrim Improved Menu - mod by sprink
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729[/url]

(which is based on Main menu wallpaper replacer by hellstorm102
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708[/url])

3. Recommended to use with
Loading Screen Logo Fix v2 by hellstorm102
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/nxm.php?mid=3708&id=14017]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/nxm.php?mid=3708&id=14017[/url]
Otherwise this mod, as other menu wallpaper replacers, will cause the Skyrim loading screens show flat pictures, instead of 3D.


* * * INSTALLATION * * *

1. (Highly Recommended)
Install (if you haven\'t already)
No Bethesda Logo In Menu - Mod by IceKK
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8023]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8023[/url]

2. (Recommended)
Install (if you haven\'t already)
Skyrim Improved Menu - mod by sprink
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729[/url]

3. (Necessary)
Install this mod (A or B version)
- with Nexus Mod Manager (Recommended)

- OR manually:

-- 3.1. If you already have the custom image files for Main Menu -
Data\\Meshes\\interface\\logo\\logo.nif
Data\\Textures\\interface\\objects\\logo02_d.dds
- backup them if you wish.

-- 3.2. Unpack this mod archive to Skyrim folder. (Overwrite - Yes).
It will create (/overwrite)
Data\\Meshes\\interface\\logo\\logo.nif
Data\\Textures\\interface\\objects\\logo02_d.dds

4. (Highly recommended)
Install (if you haven\'t already)
Loading Screen Logo Fix v2 by hellstorm102
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/nxm.php?mid=3708&id=14017]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/nxm.php?mid=3708&id=14017[/url]
(Otherwise the loading screens of Skyrim will show flat pictures, instead of 3D).

5. (Optional: Intro movie remover)
In Skyrim.ini should be the text

[General]
sIntroSequence=


* * * Uninstall: * * *

- use Nexus Mod Manager (Recommended)
- OR manually: delete (or restore previous files if you backup\'ed those)
Data\\Meshes\\interface\\logo\\logo.nif
Data\\Textures\\interface\\objects\\logo02_d.dds


* * * History: * * *

ver.1.1 - fix:
- Ver. 1.0 actually didn\'t work properly without \"Skyrim Improved Menu - mod by sprink\" (or analog). So I added here ...\\Meshes\\interface\\logo\\logo.nif by hellstorm102. Now this version should work alone well (though it wouldn\'t be so beautiful as with that mod).


* * * CREDITS * * *

- The art idea of \"Dragon Wall\" wallpaper is got from
Skyrim Main Menu - Replacement by ZayLa
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7686]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7686[/url]
- Meshes by hellstorm102
- Original images from Bethesda.
- I used .PNG\'s from gameinformer.com
[url=http://www.gameinformer.com/p/skyrimpuzzle.aspx]http://www.gameinformer.com/p/skyrimpuzzle.aspx[/url]
- Thanks Malukah for her \"Dragonborn returns\" charming singing and thanks to sprink for adding this music to his mod that goes so well with this \"Dragon Wall\" - real meditation!
- Thanks IceKK.
- Thanks nexusmods.com, modding community, dad mom etc.
author: Kamafi
